channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Structure Fire - FATALITY; INC#0012; 01:19AM; 11308 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NfQqGZ; Broadway-Manchester; FIRE NOW OUT: At 12:17AM, LAFD responded to a reported structure fire and found a one story (60' x 80') metal clad, commercial building with two autos in a carport to the rear, well involved in fire. Firefighters initiated a defensive operation and extinguished the fire in 38 minutes (83 firefighters on scene KD at 12:55AM). While conducting the primary search, they located an adult male inside the building who was sadly beyond medical help. Firefighter/Paramedics determined him deceased on scene. LAPD and LAFD Arson Section are responding for the investigation per protocol for a fatality. LA County Coroner will determine identity and cause of death. The building appeared to be filled with mattresses but it is unclear exactly what type of business was in operation. No further details at this time.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR1 BC11 BC13 BC4 CM20 CM22 E205 E215 E221 E233 E264 E266 E33 E5 E57 E64 E65 E66 EM13 HR3 RA264 RA5 RA64 RA864 T15 T21 T33 T5 T64 T66 UR5 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1519; 08:25PM; 11100 S Olive St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XfpmfC; Broadway-Manchester; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 15 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the building of origin. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E266 E46 E57 RA65 T33 T64 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1519; 08:10PM; 11100 S Olive St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XfpmfC; Broadway-Manchester; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E266 E46 E57 RA65 T33 T64 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Traffic; INC#1482; 08:09PM; 9526 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43Qc2AS; Broadway-Manchester; A total of three patients were transported (others declined LAFD transport): 17yo female in critical condition, 7 yo male in critical condition, 31yo female with non-life threatening injuries. Any further media inquiries are referred to LAFD Inc# 4301; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E33 E64 E65 EM13 HR3 RA246 RA257 RA266 RA66 RA864 RA865 T33 T64; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#1482; 07:48PM; 9526 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43Qc2AS; Broadway-Manchester; Five car collision with five patients (at this time); two in critical condition and three currently assessed as having non-life threatening injuries. One patient requires extrication. LAPD Inc# 4301; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E264 E33 E64 E65 EM13 HR3 RA246 RA257 T64 RA66 RA266 RA864 RA865; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Natural Gas Leak; INC#1339; 06:21PM; 10250 W Santa Monica Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JnhMd0; Century City; LAFD responded to reports of the smell of leaking natural gas inside a retail unit (DBA Nordstroms) which evacuated prior to LAFD arrival. Firefighters are investigating and currently have no atypical readings on the five-gas meter (portable gas detection device provides readings of the atmospheric presence of carbon monoxide, oxygen, hydrogen sulfide, hydrogen cyanide and methane). There are no persons with any medical complaints. LAFD HazMat squad is responding for a detailed investigation. No further information.; FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; E237 E95 SQ95 T37; CH7; Margaret Stewart

title.a: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Grass Fire 06/20/2023 INC#1128

item.description: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Grass Fire; INC#1128; 05:07PM; Sb 110 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NCKfgv; San Pedro; All Forward Progress Stopped. The fire jumped the freeway and extended into the triangle between the 47S and Harbor Blvd. The fire was held to approximately 1/2 acre with no structures damaged. Residents in the adjacent apartment building (number unknown) are sheltering in place due to the smoke present (no threat to the building). No injuries reported. Crews will remain on scene conducting mop up operations to ensure no hot spots remain. No further details.; FS 36; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E101 E112 E238 E248 E36 E48 E49 RA112 T38 T48; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Update Grass Fire; INC#1128; 04:43PM; Sb 110 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NCKfgv; San Pedro; Originally dispatched as a tree fire, this is now upgraded to a Grass fire with additional resources enroute. The fire is less than 1 acre but in a challenging to reach area between the 110 and CA47 interchanges at the Vincent Thomas bridge. There are no structures threatened. ; FS 36; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E101 E112 E238 E248 E36 E48 E49 RA112 T38 T48; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Tree; INC#1128; 04:18PM; SB 110 Fy x CA 47; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NCKfgv; San Pedro; A tree fire extended into approximately 1 acre of grass and additional resources added to the incident. ; FS 36; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; E112 E36 LF48 BC6 E48; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

title.a: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire 06/20/2023 INC#1059

item.description: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire; INC#1059; 04:15PM; 11460 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/2XaMUI5; Lake View Terrace; All Forward Progress Stopped: With an aggressive coordinated aerial and ground attack, 60 LAFD firefighters combined with a full brush response from #LACoFD stopped all forward progress of a grass fire, holding it to 1.5 acres. The firefighters will continue to conduct mop up operations to ensure no hot spots remain. No injuries reported. No additional resources required and no further updates anticipated. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC15 BP74 CM40 CM42 CW3A E24 E274 E290 E474 E7 E75 E77 E8140 E87 E90 E98 EM15 H2 H3 H4 H7 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA7 T74 T90 WT77; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart
